name: Attuned_Might_of_the_Tanker_A
display_name: Attuned Might of the Tanker A
display_fullname: Boosts.Attuned Might of the Tanker A
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and accuracy by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Tankers and may be slotted into any Tanker damage power.
